name: The Pooping Bird
description:
The Pooping Bird is a game about pooping on humans. Developed in 4 hours, for the game jam 8 Bits To Infinite Challenge #001, using GDevelop 5 (source: https://github.com/paulera/game-bird-poop).

Stalk this game's authors:

  • Paulo Amaral -  linkedin | github | itch | twitter
  • Monica Guimaraes - instagram | behance | artstation | threadless

Open art and resources used in this game:

  • Graphics: https://opengameart.org/users/bevouliincom
  • Sound effects:
    • DSI Studios: https://freesound.org/people/DSISStudios
    • Timtube: https://freesound.org/people/timtube
  • Music:
    • "Happy Walk" by Johan Brodd: https://opengameart.org/users/jobromedia
